title: Poster, "Hammermill Papers"
inscribed: Imprinted in black, lower margin: [logo] Printed on Hammermill Cover, Gray, Substance 65, Vellum Finish/Designed by Lloyd Brauer, Washington University, School of Fine Arts, St. Louis, Mo.
description: Two train engines facing each other with thick black and red smoke filling the upper half of the poster. Above, in white and red: May [numbers in red, and some in white].

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Hammermill Papers". Lithograph on paper. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-346.
